item.content:encoded:
According to the zombja page, 28 days later gives you "no stamina cost for moving".
According to the theme it gives "No Stamina Cost on Zombja Maps"

Move actions are the ONLY zombja action that costs stamina, so the two statements are functionally the same.
A zombja move action costs 1 zombja action point and 2 stamina.
Everything else costs varying amount of of zombja action points and 0 stamina.
With 28 days later it only cost 1 zombja action points to move.
